definition.name: JSDoc Action
definition.description: GitHub Action to build JSDoc documentation
definition.author: André Storhaug

inputs.name: source_dir
inputs.description: Source directory to build documentation from

inputs.name: output_dir
inputs.description: Output folder for the generated documentation

inputs.name: recurse
inputs.description: Recurse into subdirectories when scanning for source files

inputs.name: config_file
inputs.description: The path to a JSDoc configuration file

inputs.name: template_name
inputs.description: This input variable is deprecated in favour of "template"

inputs.name: template_dir
inputs.description: The relative location of the template files within the template package

inputs.name: front_page
inputs.description: The path to a Markdown file to be used as a the front page
